alert.note: Alert for Kern (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 15 at 10:56AM PDT until March 15 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following county, Kern. * WHEN...Until 500 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1053 AM PDT, Emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area has caused minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bakersfield, Arvin, Taft, Maricopa, Mettler, Weedpatch, Lamont, Dustin Acres and Valley Acres. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
